_header: Judas was a lither bird that Jesu sold to rood
_description: Life of Judas, in the South English Legendary

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
IVdas was a luþer brid þat Ihesu solde to RodeSomwhat man
                    may of him telle bot litel of any gode…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Swete lord þat thorwe Iudas were sold to þe
                    treoShilde vs fro þat luþer stede þat weneþ he
                    beo
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Iudas was a luþer brid þat Ihesu solde to þe
                    RodeMuche me may of him telle ac lutel of eny gode…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now swete lord þat þorw Iudas I sold weore to þe
                    treoSchilde us fro þe luþur stude þat we wene his soule Inne
                    beo
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodTan17.First Lines:
Luþir brid was Iudas þat ihesu solde to þe
                    rodeSumwhat men moun of him telle but lite of ony goode…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Swete lord þat þour Iudas sold were to þe
                    treSchilde vs fro þe liþere stede þat we wene þat he
                    be

BodAddC220.First Lines:
IVdas was a luþer bern þat solde god to þe
                    RodeSumwat me may telle of hym ac lytul of eny godeFor me ne schal
                    nout ware of y wyte bote ho so wole lyeRuben was his fader y clepud &
                    his modur Tyborie…
BodAddC220.Last Lines:
…SEint Ion þe ewangeliste þat on of þe apostles
                    iswas oure lordes auhnte sone & seint Iemes broþur y
                    wis

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Iudas was a luþer barn þat ihesu solde to rodesomwhat me
                    may of him telle ac lytel of eny goude…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…Now swete lord þat þorgh Iudas y sold were to þe
                    treoShilde vus fram þe luþer stede þat we wene þat he
                    beo

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Ivdas was a luþer brid þat ihesus solde to BodeSom wat me
                    may of hym telle ac lute of eny gode…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou suete louerdþat þoru iudas isold were to þe
                    treoSchulde ous fram þe luþere stude þat we weneþ he
                    inne beo
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 692.

CamKC13.First Lines:
Ivdas was a luþer brid þat ihesu solde to þe rodeSom
                    what me mai of him telle ac litel of eni goode…
CamKC13.Last Lines:
…Now lord þat þoru Iudas y solde were to þe
                    treSchuld vs fram þilke stede þer we weneþ þat he
                    be

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Iudas was a luþer brid þat Ihesu solde to þe
                    rodeSomwhat me may of him telle ak lutel of eny goede…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now lord þat þorw Iudas ysold were to þe
                    treoShulde vs ffram þe luþer stede þer we weneþ
                    þat he beo

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Judas was a luþer bryd þat ihesu solde to þe
                    rode& som wat me may of hym telle ac lyte of any
                    goude…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…now swete lord þat þorw Judas ysolde were to þe
                    treschulde ous fram þe luþer stede þer we weneþ
                    þat he be

BLEge2891.First Lines: Iudas was a luþer brid þat ihesu crist solde to rodeSom wat me may of him telle ac lite of eny gode…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …[   ]ete louerd þat þoru Iudas Isold were to þe treo[   ]us fram þe luþer stude þat we weneþ þat he beo
BLEge2891.Note: Beginnings of 11 lines on f. 59v lost due to damage to leaf.

BLHar2277.First Lines: Iudas was a liþer brid þat ihesu crist solde to RodeSumwhat me mai of him telle ac lute of eni gode…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou swete louerd þat þurf Iudas isold were to þe treoSchuld ous fram þe liþere stede þer we weneþ þat he beo
